title: Contar
subtitle: Counting
meta_desc: Learn to count in Spanish with audio pronunciation. Ages 2-5.
keywords: learn Spanish preschool, contar Spanish, counting Spanish kids

pages.title: Contar
pages.prompt: Warm, child-friendly watercolor illustration, landscape 16:9 format, soft pastel colors, numbers 1 through 5 in big colorful style with corresponding objects.

pages.title: Uno, dos, tres.
